name: CoinNotify
body:
CoinNotify
==========

CoinNotify is a nice and simple Bitcoin Ticker for OS X. It supports multiple currencies and exchanges (if you want another one, just [open an issue](https://github.com/ibittler/CoinNotify/issues) at our Github page) and makes easy following the Bitcoin price. **[Download here]() the compiled app**.

## Currency Support
* BTC/AUD
* BTC/CAD
* BTC/CHF
* BTC/CNY
* BTC/EUR
* BTC/GBP
* BTC/HKD
* BTC/NOK
* BTC/PLN
* BTC/RUB
* BTC/SGD
* BTC/THB
* BTC/USD
* LTC/BYC
* LTC/EUR
* LTC/USD

## Exchange Support
* Mt.Gox
* Bitstamp
* BTC-E
* CampBX

## Donations
I develop CoinNotify on my free time, but I still have to pay my rent and other bills. If you want to contribute to the development, you can consider making a donation to the Bitcoin address: `12DLbJY48o5vFn3f7eDy7g98yPfo215W4b`

## Contact
You can contact me through an issue at the Github page, via ibittler@outlook.com or Bitmessage.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
